name: SYNC_EXTRACT_SPEC
title: SYNC_EXTRACT_SPEC
description: Details of specification of Extract, used in a request to specify an Extract, or in a response, to describe what is actually in the Extract.

element.short: Details of specification of Extract, used in a request to specify an Extract, or in a response, to describe what is actually in the Extract.
element.definition: Details of specification of Extract, used in a request to specify an Extract, or in a response, to describe what is actually in the Extract.

element.short: True if the Versions from the Contribution are included; False if just the Contribution and its Audit are included.
element.definition: True if the Versions from the Contribution are included; False if just the Contribution and its Audit are included.

element.short: List of Contributions to include / that are included in the Extract.
element.definition: List of Contributions to include / that are included in the Extract.

element.short: Specify Contributions included in Extract by threshold date.
element.definition: Specify Contributions included in Extract by threshold date.

element.short: True if all Contributions in the record are included.
element.definition: True if all Contributions in the record are included.
